entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 10:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: NW 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
